title: Chrysocercops castanopsidis
text:
Chrysocercops castanopsidis is a <a href="moth">moth</a> of the family <a href="Gracillariidae">Gracillariidae</a>. It is known from <a href="Japan">Japan</a> (Honshū, Iriomote, Isigaki, Okinawa and Shikoku).
The <a href="wingspan">wingspan</a> is about 6.2–8 mm.
The <a href="larva">larva</a>e feed on "<a href="Castanopsis%20cuspidata">Castanopsis cuspidata</a>", "<a href="Castanopsis%20sieboldii">Castanopsis sieboldii</a>", "<a href="Lithocarpus%20glaber">Lithocarpus glaber</a>" and "<a href="Pasania%20glabra">Pasania glabra</a>". They probably <a href="leaf%20miner">mine</a> the leaves of their host plant.
